sagex.phoenix.weather

Interface ICurrentForecast

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IForecastPeriod
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrentForecast

    public interface ICurrentForecast
extends IForecastPeriod
    Interface to access the Current Weather Forecast data for the current day note: not all fields will be populated depending on the implementation - non-implemented string fields should return null - non-implemented integer fields should return

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface sagex.phoenix.weather.IForecastPeriod

        IForecastPeriod.Type

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface sagex.phoenix.weather.IForecastPeriod

        iInvalid, iNotSupported, sInvalid, sNotSupported, WindCalm

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getCloudCover()
      Return the Formatted cloud cover for the current weather forecast
      java.util.Date getDate()
      Returns the Date for the current weather forecast
      java.lang.String getDewPoint()
      Return the DewPoint for the current weather forecast
      int getFeelsLike()
      Return the Windchill or Feels like temperature for the current weather forecast
      java.lang.String getPressure()
      Return the Barometric Pressure for the current weather forecast
      int getPressureDir()
      Return an indicator of the Barometric Pressure rising/falling for the current weather forecast 0 steady (default) 1 rising -1 falling
      java.lang.String getSunrise()
      Returns the Sunrise time, such as, "7:28 am", if known
      java.lang.String getSunset()
      Return the Sunset time, such as, "4:53 pm", if known
      java.lang.String getUVIndex()
      Return the UVIndex for the current weather forecast
      java.lang.String getUVWarn()
      Return the UVWarn for the current weather forecast
      int getVisibility()
      Return the Visibility for the current weather forecast

      • Methods inherited from interface sagex.phoenix.weather.IForecastPeriod

        getCode, getCondition, getDescription, getHumid, getPrecip, getTemp, getType, getWindDir, getWindDirText, getWindSpeed
